title: $15 RP
body: If I bought a $15 CVS card or whatever, would I get $15s worth of RP or would it not register or something. If so how much RP would I get

replies.body:
It depends on the currency and exchange rates at the moment (if you're using CAD instead of USD). Our [Openbucks FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753254-Cash-and-Gift-Cards-Openbucks-) goes over how this system works if you wanted a quick rundown.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
